SELECT SCHEDULE_CATEGORY_ID, SCHEDULE_CATEGORY_NAME,
DELETE_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_MS_USER_ID, UPDATE_MS_USER_ID
FROM MS_SCHEDULE_CATEGORY
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = False

INSERT INTO MS_SCHEDULE_CATEGORY( SCHEDULE_CATEGORY_NAME , DELETE_FLAG , UPDATE_MS_USER_ID , CREATE_MS_USER_ID ) VALUES( :SCHEDULE_CATEGORY_NAME , :SCHEDULE_CATEGORY_TEXT , :DELETE_FLAG , :UPDATE_MS_USER_ID , :CREATE_MS_USER_ID )

UPDATE MS_SCHEDULE_CATEGORY SET SCHEDULE_CATEGORY_NAME = :SCHEDULE_CATEGORY_NAME , DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , UPDATE_MS_USER_ID = :UPDATE_MS_USER_ID
WHERE SCHEDULE_CATEGORY_ID = :SCHEDULE_CATEGORY_ID
